drupalNodeEvent.title: The History and Future of Chinese Classical Scholarship 經典的未來

field_speakers.processed:
Speaker: 

David B. Honey (Brigham Young University)

Discussants: 

Su Jie 蘇傑 (Fudan University)
Wu Fei 吳飛 (Beijing University)
Pham Lee-moi 范麗梅 (Academia Sinica)

field_organizers.processed: This talk is part of an online colloquium series hosted by the Institute of Chinese Literature and Philosophy at Academia Sinica, Taiwan. For further information, please visit the website at the provided URL.

drupalNodeEvent.field_event_language: Chinese (with Power Point in both English and Chinese)
